works.description:
Kanz Jewels L.L.C. in Deira Gold Souq,  
Dubai has a gold ring on its shelves, which will never grace any finger, as  
it weighs 63.85kg. It’s the world’s largest gold ring made out of 21 carat  
gold. The Najmat Taiba (Star of Taiba) is made from 5.17kg of precious  
stones and 58.7kg of gold. While it cost $547,000 to make the ring back in  
2000, the current value is worth over $3 million. Anil Dhanak, Managing  
Director of Kanz, said…
